# Ninja Archetypes
## Overview
The following archetypes are for the ninja class:


| **Archetype** | **Source** |
|---|---|
| [[Frozen Shadow (Archetype)\|Frozen Shadow]] | Inner Sea Intrigue |
| Gunpowder Bombardier | Heroes from the Fringe |
| Hunting Serpent | Villain Codex |
| Mask of the Whispering God | Disciple's Doctrine |
| Petal Ninja | Wilderness Origins |
| Web Walker | Power of the Ninja (Super Genius Games) 19 |
